page.title: 07A DAY AT THE TOURIST OFFICE
page.content: I went with the schoolbus at 8.10am, arriving in good time, so I swept floors and dusted shelves. I checked to see who got Bed & Breakfast from the office yesterday.I looked to see what kind of day Monday was: the sales and people in.Council came with boxes of stock to count. Phone kept ringing between jobs with hotel vacancies for the day. Man in from Aboyne wondering about a Book a Bed Ahead in England. Chap asking about Railway show; why so few signatures in the book?I must remember to ask people to sign it. Lady in wanting to know where she would find Tibetan gardens in Scotland. The only clues were Sherriff, which was the name of the owners in the 1920's and that it was in Scotland. Can I find out where it is? A frantic search in Scotland's Gardens book but no luck.
